title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Strengthening 3D Modeling Competencies Using the 6E Instructional Model

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic scientific principles and digital tool application experience
context.additional_context: Project-based education for corporate managers/leaders to enhance science-related job competencies, with limited tech support focused on smartphones in PC-free environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic 3D modeling principles and scientific applications through stage-based activities of the 6E instructional model
Learners can create simple scientific models using smartphone-based 3D modeling tools through collaborative problem-solving strategies
Learners can demonstrate results of applying metacognitive thinking (planning-execution-reflection) in modeling processes through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
